name: Thief City
description:
WHAT IS THIEF CITY?
Thief City is a 4-20 player online casual, action game.
Rob civilians, get cash, fight other players, avoid police, and gather weapons and items along your journey to the top of the leaderboards!



CROSS PLATFORM
Enjoy cross-platform mayhem and play with your friends not only through Steam but also on Android and iOS.



GAME MODES
Rob 'em - You have two minutes to collect as much money as you can! Collect items and money around the map and rob innocent bystanders. Collect weapons and rob other players to knock them off the leaderboard!

More game modes coming soon!!



HOW DOES IT WORK?
Solana Battle Royale allows your community to duke it out in frantic Battle Royale-style gameplay.
To join the fun, this is how it works:
​
1. First, the player selects their favorite Solana community that they'll be representing.

2. Next, the Player enters their Discord ID, which allows community leaders to identify winners.

3. The player selects their character from the corresponding Solana community roster.

4. After selecting game options, players battle it out as the mayhem begins! The last team standing is declared the winner

5. A final leaderboard is displayed with the top-scoring players. If desired, the Solana communities can choose to reward their top players.

Communities can either have their own members battle against each other OR multiple Solana communities can compete for the ultimate victory!
